email_subject: TECH ALERT: The Year in Technology 2001
email_body: TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Thursday, Dec. 20, 2001 A long slump battered technology companies this year, but the Internet's role in everyday life continued to grow. See how stocks performed, check out the key Internet metrics, and read how one neighborhood used the Net as a lifeline after Sept. 11.
